info.name: Citation Machine Ad block Grey 1.1
info.description:
Removes those pesky ads and that 30s video and iframes inside iframes. Also makes the site larger and changes text to 12px Times New Roman font.
My Patreon My Other Styles
info.additionalInfo:
I recommend using ZenMate Firewall as 52% is ads and 18% is tracking.
Note: Images are blocked on site for example images
1.1
--Improved spacing of the site


Notes for code (nothing here!  No really, this is just stuff that got cut out.)
